item.title: Mastering Tmux: The Ultimate Terminal Multiplexer Guide | Tmux 终端神器：终端复用完全指南
item.author: kytedance@gmail.com (kyden)
item.description:
Introduction | 导语

In modern development environments, efficient terminal management is crucial for productivity. Tmux, a powerful terminal multiplexer, enables you to manage multiple sessions within a single terminal window, featuring advanced capabilities like window splitting and session persistence. Whether for local development or remote server management, Tmux enhances your terminal workflow significantly. This guide will comprehensively cover Tmux’s features, from basic operations to advanced configurations, helping you achieve a quantum leap in terminal efficiency.

在现代开发环境中，高效的终端管理是提升工作效率的关键。Tmux 作为一款强大的终端复用工具，不仅能让你在一个终端窗口中同时操作多个会话，还能实现窗口分割、会话保持等高级功能。无论是本地开发还是远程服务器管理，Tmux 都能让你的终端操作更加得心应手。本文将带你全面了解 Tmux 的各项功能，从基础操作到高级配置，让你的终端使用效率得到质的飞跃。
